O

operatorGraph - Class in UILayer
The operatorGraph class represents the user interface for displaying pie charts of orders done by operators (sales assistants).
operatorGraph() - Constructor for class UILayer.operatorGraph
Creates a new instance of the operatorGraph class.
Order - Class in BusinessLayer
The Order class represents a customer order containing a collection of items.
Order() - Constructor for class BusinessLayer.Order
Constructs an empty Order.
Order(String, Date, List<Item>, double, double, String) - Constructor for class BusinessLayer.Order
Constructs a new Order with the specified customer information, timestamp, items, total amount, amount paid, and operator name.
OrderDAO - Class in DBLayer
The OrderDAO class provides data access methods for handling orders and related operations in the database.
OrderDAO() - Constructor for class DBLayer.OrderDAO
Default constructor for creating an OrderDAO instance with its own database connection.
OrderDAO(Connection) - Constructor for class DBLayer.OrderDAO
Constructor for creating an OrderDAO instance with a provided database connection.
OrderGraphUI - Class in UILayer
The OrderGraphUI class represents the user interface for displaying order graphs.
OrderGraphUI() - Constructor for class UILayer.OrderGraphUI
Default constructor for OrderGraphUI.
